name: Knight Quest: The Quest to Eliminate Self-Reflection
name_original: Knight Quest: The Quest to Eliminate Self-Reflection
description:
Knight Quest: The Quest to Eliminate Self-Reflection is a story of a desperate knight that is trying to find some happiness in his life. He is very sad and anxious for he hides a deep secret noone is allowed to know. So he decides to go on an adventure to make everything right. 

Knight Quest: The Quest to Eliminate Self-Reflection is a 2D pixelated hack-and-slash platformer. The main character uses special abilities and travels through randomly generated levels to complete his journey. He has to fight off a lot of enemies along the way until he gets to his main goal. Slaying the King.

This is a prototype made exclusively for the Weelky game jam: 148 with the theme: Mirror. Our other games and projects can be also found on panicgames.sk, where Knight Quest will allso be later released.
